tasks.label: Create HTML Project Structure
args: mkdir css, js, images; New-Item -Path index.html -ItemType File -Force -Value "<!DOCTYPE html>`n<html>`n<head>`n    <title>My HTTP Project</title>`n    <link rel='stylesheet' type='text/css' href='css/style.css'>`n</head>`n<body>`n    <script src='js/script.js'></script>`n</body>`n</html>"; New-Item -Path css/style.css -ItemType File -Force -Value "body {`n    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;`n}"; New-Item -Path js/script.js -ItemType File -Force -Value "document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {`n    console.log('Hello, world!');`n});"
